articles.description: Shouldn't the Spartans take over the top spot after they beat Purdue and after Villanova and Virginia lost? Not so fast. Michigan State's body of work doesn't compare to its elite competition.
articles.headline: College hoops Power Rankings: Why Michigan State is not ready to be No. 1

images.caption: Miles Bridges and Michigan State enjoyed knocking off  Purdue on Saturday.
images.name: Purdue vs. Michigan State (Miles Bridges) [608x342]

images.caption: No. 4 Michigan State overcomes a double-digit deficit in the first half and gets a go-ahead 3-pointer from Miles Bridges in the final seconds to beat No. 3 Purdue 68-65.
images.name: Michigan State tops Purdue late

articles.description: ESPN draft expert Jonathan Givony projects a new top 60 for the 2019 NBA draft class.
articles.headline: NBA mock draft: Five rising prospects for 2019

images.caption: De'Andre Hunter could be a first-round pick in 2019.
images.name: De'Andre Hunter [608x342]

images.caption: Niem Stevenson misses a layup, but Zhaire Smith comes out of nowhere and rises up for a two-handed dunk.
images.name: Smith elevates for epic putback slam

articles.description: Payton Pritchard had 19 points and 10 assists, and Troy Brown Jr. also had a double-double to lead Oregon past Washington State 84-57 on Sunday night.
articles.headline: Pritchard, Brown lead Oregon to 84-57 win over Washington St

articles.description: Shep Garner scored 16 points and Tony Carr had 15 points to lead Penn State to a 74-52 victory over Illinois on Sunday night.
articles.headline: Garner, Carr help Penn State beat Illinois 74-52

articles.description: After scoring a team-high 23 points, Grayson Allen credits the good ball movement to set him up in the Blue Devils' 80-69 win over the Yellow Jackets.
articles.headline: Allen credits ball movement for open looks

images.name: Allen credits ball movement for open looks

articles.description: Grayson Allen scored 23 points and No. 9 Duke beat Georgia Tech 80-69 on Sunday night to end a two-game losing streak.
